trans-unit.source: A trigger action that begins a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> and distributes its animations to their targeted objects and properties.
trans-unit.target: Uma ação do gatilho que inicia um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> e distribui suas animações para suas propriedades e objetos de destino.

trans-unit.source: Use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> action with an <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> or a <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> to apply animations to their target properties and start them.
trans-unit.target: Use um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> ação com um <xref:System.Windows.EventTrigger> ou <xref:System.Windows.Trigger> para aplicar animações a suas propriedades de destino e iniciá-los.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> begins a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> by calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> on its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> reference when triggered.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> começa uma <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> chamando <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> em seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> referência quando disparado.

trans-unit.source: When you begin a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> on a property that is already being animated by another <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> determines how the animation proceeds.
trans-unit.target: Quando você iniciar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> em uma propriedade que já está sendo animada por outro <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.HandoffBehavior%2A> propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> determina como a animação continua.

trans-unit.source: Pause, Resume, Stop, or Otherwise Control a Storyboard Interactively
trans-unit.target: Pausar, retomar, parar ou controlar um Storyboard interativamente

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> that was declared in markup interactively, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>.
trans-unit.target: Para pausar, retomar ou controlar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> que foi declarado na marcação interativamente, você deve definir o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> propriedade do seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>.

trans-unit.source: You can then control the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> by using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object (such as <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) to control it by referencing its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, você pode controlar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> usando um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> objeto (como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard>) controlá-lo fazendo referência a seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> cannot be interactively controlled after it is begun.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> não for especificado, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard%2A> não pode ser controlado interativamente depois que ele é iniciado.

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [como: usar gatilhos de eventos para controlar um Storyboard após iniciar](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: In code, you may use the interactive methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> class to control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> that was applied using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>.
trans-unit.target: No código, você pode usar os métodos interativos do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> classe para controlar uma <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> que foi aplicada usando um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>.

trans-unit.source: As is the case when using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> objects, you must give the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> a name for its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> to be interactively controllable.
trans-unit.target: Como é o caso quando usando <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> objetos, você deve fornecer o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> um nome para seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> para ser interativamente controláveis.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the proper hand-off behavior to start an animation clock in this storyboard
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o comportamento de entrega apropriado para iniciar um relógio de animação nesse storyboard

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior" /> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de enumeração <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.SnapshotAndReplace" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.SnapshotAndReplace" />.

trans-unit.source: Using the Compose HandoffBehavior
trans-unit.target: Usando o HandoffBehavior de composição

trans-unit.source: When you apply a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to a property by using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose?displayProperty=nameWithType>, any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects previously associated with that property continue to consume system resources; the timing system does not remove these clocks automatically.
trans-unit.target: Quando você aplica um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> para uma propriedade usando <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose?displayProperty=nameWithType>, qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objetos anteriormente associados com aquela propriedade continuam a consumir recursos do sistema; o sistema de tempo não removerá esses relógios automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: To avoid performance issues when you apply a large number of clocks using <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose>, you should remove composing clocks from the animated property after they complete.
trans-unit.target: Para evitar problemas de desempenho ao aplicar um grande número de relógios usando <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.HandoffBehavior.Compose>, você deve remover relógios de composição da propriedade animada após a conclusão.

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to remove a clock:
trans-unit.target: Há várias maneiras de remover um relógio de:

trans-unit.source: To remove all clocks from a property, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> method of the animated object.
trans-unit.target: Para remover todos os relógios de uma propriedade, use o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.ApplyAnimationClock%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock%29> ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%28System.Windows.DependencyProperty%2CSystem.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline%29> método do objeto animado.

trans-unit.source: Specify the property being animated as the first parameter, and `null` as the second.
trans-unit.target: Especifique a propriedade sendo animada como o primeiro parâmetro, e `null` como o segundo.

trans-unit.source: This will remove all animation clocks from the property.
trans-unit.target: Isso removerá todos os relógios de animação da propriedade.

trans-unit.source: To remove a specific <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> from a list of clocks, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> to retrieve a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, then call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.
trans-unit.target: Para remover um determinado <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> de uma lista de relógios, use o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> para recuperar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>, chame o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A> método do <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>.

trans-unit.source: This is typically done in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event handler for a clock.
trans-unit.target: Isso geralmente é feito o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> um relógio de manipulador de eventos.

trans-unit.source: Note that only root clocks can be controlled by a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> property of a child clock returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Observe que somente relógios de raiz podem ser controlados por um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController>; o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Controller%2A> retorna a propriedade de um relógio filho `null`.

trans-unit.source: Note also that the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> event is not called if the effective duration of the clock is forever.
trans-unit.target: Observe também que o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.Completed> evento não será chamado se a duração efetiva do relógio for indefinida.

trans-unit.source: In that case, the user must determine when to call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o usuário deve determinar quando chamar <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This is primarily an issue for animations on objects that have a long lifetime.
trans-unit.target: Isso é basicamente um problema para animações em objetos que têm um longo tempo de vida.

trans-unit.source: When an object is garbage collected, its clocks are also disconnected and garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: Quando um objeto é coletado como lixo, seus relógios também serão desconectados e coletados como lixo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about clock objects, see [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre objetos clock, consulte [visão geral do sistema de controle de tempo e animação](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" />.

trans-unit.source: By naming the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" /> object, the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> can be controlled after it is started.
trans-unit.target: Nomeando o objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" />, o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> poderá ser controlado depois que for iniciado.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: To be able to pause, resume, or otherwise interactively control a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> property of its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> object like <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> to reference this name.
trans-unit.target: Para pausar, retomar ou controlar interativamente um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> propriedade do seu <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> e usar um <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ControllableStoryboardAction> objeto como <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.PauseStoryboard>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ResumeStoryboard>, ou <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.StopStoryboard> para fazer referência a esse nome.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> is unspecified, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> cannot be interactively affected after it is begun; furthermore, when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> ends or enters its Fill period, the animation clocks are disposed of.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Name%2A> de <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> não for especificado, o <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> não podem ser afetados interativamente depois que ele é iniciado; Além disso, quando a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> termina ou insere seu período de preenchimento, a animação relógios são descartados.

trans-unit.source: See [How to: Use Event Triggers to Control a Storyboard After It Starts](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Consulte [como: usar gatilhos de eventos para controlar um Storyboard após iniciar](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-use-event-triggers-to-control-a-storyboard-after-it-starts.md) para obter mais informações.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> that this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" /> starts.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> que o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" /> inicia.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" /> starts.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard" /> que o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard" /> é iniciado.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: Informações da propriedade de dependência

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: Campo de identificador

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: Propriedades de metadados é definido como `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: Nenhum

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica a propriedade de dependência <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard.Storyboard" />.
